entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or periods of freezing drizzle changing to drizzle in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches developing near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
